snippet: The proposed changes announced Wednesday by the dominant Conservatives followed sharp gains in local elections last week by a populist party that wants to curb migration.
abstract: Britain moves to toughen immigration rules, as government tries to regain initiative after electoral gains by populist party that wants country to curb immigration and leave European Union.
lead_paragraph: The proposed changes announced Wednesday by the dominant Conservatives followed sharp gains in local elections last week by a populist party that wants to curb migration.

headline.seo: Britain Moves to Toughen Rules on Immigrants
headline.main: British Government Moves to Toughen Rules on Immigrants
headline.print_headline: British Government Moves to Toughen Rules on Immigrants

keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
keywords.name: persons
